target_audience: Parents of infants (0-2 years old), primarily mothers
color_scheme: Teal, white, yellow, orange. Clean and bright.
composition: Product-focused with a baby wearing the diaper.
special_elements: Product features highlighted with icons and descriptions (Gentle Skin Protection, Dual Leak Guard Barriers, Ultra-Soft Absorbent Layers, Wetness Indicator), claim of "100% Leakproof skin protection"
